title: ii weekend streams!
body:
hello lovelies! as promised, i will go ahead and do a couple weekend streams - one tomorrow evening at 6:00pm cst and one on sunday at 1:00pm cst! i’ll try to get the room (x) open about half an hour beforehand so everyone can get in, and then i’ll stream the full ii movie followed by the ‘deleted scene’ (total streaming time is about 2hr and 15min)

i will not be streaming it on mobile, so there is no group code - if you have trouble with my room link, try searching ‘knlalla’ or ‘dan and phil interactive introverts stream’

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Twins Masterlist
body:
Copy and Paste (ao3) - thathipsterkaiya

Summary: It’s such a simple concept to copy and paste words on a screen. As for real life relationships? Not so much. Not for Phil, whose boyfriend Aaron Jeffrey Howell was suddenly cut out from his life. How lovely would it be to just copy and paste Aaron Howell’s living identical twin brother Dan into the picture with a simple click? If only life was that easy.

Double Act - phanlight

Summary: When Phil falls in love with Dan’s twin, Dan finds it increasingly difficult to show his true emotions towards the situation, especially when his brother comes to visit. But will Phil’s drunken mind suddenly change everything between the three of them? Read on to find out more!

Dude, Your Brother is Driving Me Nuts - tolkienrowlingfan

Summary: Dan has gone to help out his twin brother, Dylan who also happened to be bffs with his boyfriend, Phil.  Later Phil mistakes Dan for his brother and starts complaining about Dan and a marriage proposal?

Keep Making Trouble Till You Find What You Love (ao3) - SacredPhil (Helixhalifax)

Summary: Dan has a twin sister called Lucy, who comes to stay. What happens when Phil begins to have feelings for her? But is he really crushing on his best friend’s sister or is she just his heart’s way of pointing out something different, like the many parallels between the two Howells, or a love story left behind in 2009? Does Lucy know more than she’s letting on? And why does the girl in the other flat look so familiar?

Late Nights, Early Mornings: Part Two - petewent

Summary:
“I may have accidentally had sex with my boyfriend’s twin last night…and he didn’t stop me.”

“How was it?”

“Fantastic, but that’s not the point.”

Sibling Rivalry (ao3) - dannihowell

Summary: The Howell twins both fancy their new neighbor, Phil.

The Reject - butterflyphil

Summary: Dan might be a little bit in love with his best friend, but it’s okay. Phil doesn’t get crushes, at least as far as Dan can tell, so Dan has spent the last two years pining in secret while learning to accept the fact that Phil might never see him the same way.

And it’s fine. It is. He feels lucky to have Phil as a friend at all, and he is perfectly happy to keep things the way they are. But things are bound to change when he finds some pretty convincing evidence that Phil does get crushes. And, as it turns out, boys who look like Dan are exactly Phil’s cup of tea.

The only problem? The object of Phil’s affection is Dan’s twin brother.

The Wrong Twin - pasteldanhowells

Summary: pastel!Dan has a crush on his twin brother’s boyfriend. but he finally moves on when he gets a boyfriend. Dan’s new boyfriend drags him to a party where Dan gets drunk and runs into Phil. Things happen.

Twin Troubles - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Phil has a twin, and they don’t get along. His twin tortures him throughout his childhood. Phil finally has enough and cuts Pierce out of his life. Fast forward, and now Phil’s married to Dan. But now Pierce has re-entered Phil’s life again, asking for help.

Two Of A Kind (wattpad) - phanallamallama

Summary: Phil doesn’t have a best friend in his life. That is, until Dan turns up at his school. They become close and Phil finds out that Dan has a twin brother, but hates to talk about him. It’s not until Phil comes over to Dan’s house that he finds out why.

now,,,,,this was made in 2012. so there was definitely a lot of that visible in how dnp act (phil literally basically never looks at dan, dan looks at phil quite a lot - perhaps for some kind of support) but the message is p clear: there are some things they think aren’t the internet’s business to know about. if you watch from the timestamped link earlier and through hazel’s bit they come back to dnp and they both comment on how talking about relationships is basically a big no for them. it’s just a v interesting piece of their history, imo
